ygData.subject: RE: Lambent Breastplate (spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Blueberry is what we call our female dwarven paladin in full PoF armour. I however get called Bananaman, C3PO, canary, and Lord of the Dance. Last one isnt
ygData.messageBody:
>
>Shada Bladestorm, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
>Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
>Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
>Manda, Level 15 Wood Elf Warrior
>Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>p.s. what nicknames are floating around other servers? Blueberry seems to
>be the prevailing one on mine for any bards with lambent armor =)
>
>>

Blueberry is what we call our female dwarven paladin in full PoF armour. I
however get called Bananaman, C3PO, canary, and Lord of the Dance. Last one
isnt related to the full set of imbrued i wear, just everybody trying to be
cute =p


Gendal Concorden, lvl 50 bard
Enoch Lyciferous, lvl 41 necromancer
Tunare
